idea:
Under the guidance of Hon' Union Minister, Shri Nitin Gadkari, the infrastructure space in India is moving leaps and bounds in the correct  direction. Infrastructure in India will be the fuel for economic growth for the forseable future. Infrastructure will be the bedrock to transform India into a Powerhouse economy that it truly has the potential to achieve. Keeping this sentiment in mind, we are entering this space to play our part in building the bright future of India. 

We are desirous to start a Stone Crushing Plant to manufacture crushed sand and aggregates. These products are an integral part of making concrete used in all infrastructure projects and real estate projects. The products we propose to manufacture are used by Ready Mix Suppliers to make Concrete. It is used to lay roads, bridges, railway lines, construct various industrial, commercial as well as residential structures. 

For this purpose we have already acquired land wherein we have mines with materials worth upto 15-20 years. We have formulated a company for this purpose and our Business projects are ready as well. We have shorlisted the company to provide us the crushing plant and the Project managers for the plant as well. All permissions required are also underway albeit a little slow due to the ongoing Pandemic. But we expect to get all permission within 3 -5 months as well. 

We need start-up funding to start our operations and do our bit in this momentous journey that India has embarked upon under the guidance of our Hon' PM Shri Narendra Modi and Hon' Minister Shri Nitin Gadkari. 


Thank You
name: Gyanesh Stone Crushers

idea:
With growing disease burdens, including Covid-19, access to rapid and accurate diagnostics, that is also affordable, is the need of the hour in a country like ours. For a population of over 1.3 billion, there are only around 400 PCR machines in our entire country.

Distance between the place where the test is conducted and where it is sent for diagnosis due to limited PCR Labs also leads to delay in reporting and make these tests expensive. This has kept HCPs deprived from doing many “confirmatory” tests in infectious diseases

Many doctors are unaware of the complete benefits of Molecular Diagnostics & Point-of-Care technologies, that can change the way physicians make therapy choices for their patients in India.

 There is huge unmet need of early and accurate diagnosis of multiple diseases currently in India, and majority of Indians, who live beyond the metros, currently do not have access to these services.

Rivaara is committed to address current and future unmet needs of clinicians and patients in India, for quick and actionable healthcare information to improve the overall quality of life of Patients

Rivaara Labs mission is to be the leading and most trusted Molecular Diagnostics and Point of Care technology provider in India, across infectious diseases, oncology, antibiotic resistance, pathogen detection, inherited disease testing and precision medicine, enabling doctors and patients to achieve timely and superior clinical outcomes.

We provide an opportunity for hospitals to set up RT-PCR labs, that is, equipped with state-of-the-art technologies, and extensive tests services, by setting up a central reference lab and mass labs across 70-80 cities across metros, tier 1 and Tier 2 cities in India. Tier 1 and Tier 2 cities are currently underserved by existing players leading to longer waiting time and expensive testing.

The test menu from Rivaara is an innovative and offers high volume tests with quick turnaround time at mass labs and wide comprehensive suite at central labs.

Currently, high prices of these tests, are a key barrier to the usage of molecular testing in India. Rivaara will focus on creating value for money for patients, as more than 50% of its test menu consists of multiplex panels. This high value, niche tests will address the need of the underserved test segments, and may lead to reduction in price by competitors too

This will be provided by a strong network of specialized Molecular Diagnostics labs, novel point of care solutions and build a best in class national reference lab, providing relevant, actionable, rapid and accurate diagnostics at an affordable cost to benefit patients

Rivaara will also address to the increased demand for molecular diagnostics driven by government initiatives, which focus on encouraging the use of molecular diagnostics, as means of testing, especially for infectious diseases (e.g. Covid-19, TB, HIV, infection, Hepatitis B/C etc.)

Rivaara will address the limitations of the currently existing lab models in the country.

Rivaara’s Next-Gen sequencing platforms will also address the burden of genetic disorders in India.

Early screening of pregnancy can be made a regular practice with Rivaara’s platform can reduce this burden in India, where cost and access is a major constraint
name: RIVAARA LABS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
SAHYADRI RANGERS is a national adventure organization with expertise in Adventure activities across the nation specializing in Sahyadri, Western Ghats and Himalayas. We understand that one size does not fit all and therefore Western bring to you the freedom and flexibility to roam around. We offer events in

Hiking, Trekking, Bike riding, Fort camping, Beach Camping, Scuba Diving, Climbing and

many more.

Nothing beats the simple rhythm of gentle hiking, flawless climbing, soothing camping and good fellowship in beautiful places. We aim to give you the best adventure experiences of your lifetime.
name: Sahyadri Rangers Treks And Tours
